job_tasks.phrase: Data uit de bots, de klanttevredenheidscores (NPS), de herkenning en het antwoord op de vraag of de klant écht geholpen is, dit kun jij allemaal aan elkaar knopen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes analyzing performance data from bots and customer interactions to understand effectiveness and identify areas for improvement, which is a form of data analysis for AI model enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Je komt met concrete voorstellen om de bots nóg beter aan te laten sluiten bij de behoeftes van onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding customer needs and proposing strategic improvements to the AI system (bots) to better meet those needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Op basis van de klantdata zorg jij als AI-trainer ervoor dat de herkenning goed is zodat de klant het juiste antwoord krijgt. Aan de hand van de data bouw je aan de NLU (Natural Language Understanding).
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the role of an AI trainer building and improving NLU capabilities based on data, which is a core model development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je overlegt met de verschillende stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions discussing with stakeholders, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: de dialogen en de flows die je ontwerpt en bouwt
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building conversational dialogues and flows is central to crafting effective interactions with AI models, akin to prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Je maakt transactionele usecases en zorgt dat de dialogen lekker lopen, dat het technisch werkt met de koppelingen van de systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes creating functional use cases and ensuring technical integration with system connections, which are traditional software development and integration tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je test en releast gestructureerd en als er een issue of verstoring is, neem je een coördinerende rol in het aansturen van het oplossen ervan.
job_tasks.justification: This covers structured testing, releasing, and coordinating issue resolution, which are key MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan de continue verbetering van onze test- en releaseprocessen, met focus op kwaliteit
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions improving test and release processes, a core MLOps function.

soft_skills.phrase: Je overlegt met de verschillende stakeholders
neem je een coördinerende rol in het aansturen van het oplossen ervan

profile.rationale: The role involves building NLU and designing conversational flows (1.B.1, 1.B.2), analyzing data for AI improvement (1.B.3), and also integrating these conversational AI components into systems and managing their testing and release (1.A.1, 1.A.2). This demonstrates a balanced mix of core AI specialization (specifically conversational AI) and core software engineering tasks. The focus on NLU and dialogs clearly places it within the Generative AI domain. Therefore, 'Core GenAI Engineer' is the most appropriate profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is detailed and clearly outlines responsibilities that map well to the defined categories in the coding book. The Dutch language is understandable in context with the technical terms, allowing for a confident analysis.
